title: Parliament to meet for first time under new Prime Minister
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Today’s the first day that Parliament convenes after the appointment of the new Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe.
The primary task of the day is to select a suitable candidate for the post of Deputy Speaker.
Attorney General directs police to arrest 22 people linked to MynaGoGama & GotaGoGama attacks
